Package mars.simulator

Class ExceptionCause

java.lang.Object
mars.simulator.ExceptionCause
public class ExceptionCause extends Object
Represents the cause of an error/interrupt that occurs during execution (simulation).
Version:
August 2005
Author:
Pete Sanderson
